    mode: "parallel"
    
    per_module:
      # æ¯ä¸ªæ¨¡å—çš„å¼€å‘æµç¨‹

        - stage: "design"
          agent: spec-design
          params:
            depth: "è¯¦ç»†"
            focus: "å½“å‰æ¨¡å—"

          agent: spec-tasks

            mode: "æ ‡å‡†"

          agent: spec-impl
          mode: "iterative"
          params:
            implementation_mode: "æ ‡å‡†"
            test_requirement: "å®Œæ•´æµ‹è¯•"
          output: "{module}_code/"
      
      # æ¨¡å—å†…ä»»åŠ¡å¹¶è¡Œ
      internal_parallelism:
        enabled: true
        max_parallel_tasks: 3
        condition: "æ— ä¾èµ–å…³ç³»çš„ä»»åŠ¡"
    
    # æ¨¡å—é—´åŒæ­¥ç‚¹

  # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  quality_monitoring:
    agent: spec-judge
    mode: "continuous"
    
    parallel_evaluation:
      enabled: true
      evaluate_each_module: true
      real_time_feedback: true
    
    checkpoints:
      - module_design_complete
      - module_tasks_complete
      - module_implementation_complete
      - integration_complete
    
    alerts:
      quality_drop: "ä»»ä½•æ¨¡å—è´¨é‡ä½äºé˜ˆå€¼"
      interface_mismatch: "æ¥å£ä¸ä¸€è‡´"
